text: If the sharks were men, the fish would stop being all equal as they are now. Some would hold certain offices, which would place them above the others. Those pebbles that were a little bigger would even be allowed to slip into the smallest. The sharks would like this practice, as it would provide them with more mouths. The fattest peasants, who would be those who occupied certain positions, would be those who would keep order among the smaller peasants, and would be teachers or officials, engineers specializing in the construction of boxes, etc. FIN
title: Si los tiburones fueran hombres VI
author: Bertolt Brecht
